{"id":792061257,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1662378403,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/792061257/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Distances Between Same Letters","memory":"13.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkDistances(string s, vector<int>& d) {\n        int n=s.length();\n        vector<pair<char,int>>vp;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            vp.push_back({s[i],i});\n        }sort(vp.begin(),vp.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i+=2){\n            if(d[vp[i].first-'a']!=(max(vp[i].second,vp[i+1].second)-min(vp[i].second,vp[i+1].second))-1)\n                return 0;\n        }\n        return 1;\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-distances-between-same-letters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
